name: vz-like-keymap
description: A keymap similar to VZ Editor

vzKeymap.textStack.description: Controls whether the clipboard acts as a stack for actions Cut, Copy and Paste

enumDescriptions: Scroll up/down by half a page

vzKeymap.alt+W.description: On: Switch Editor Window / Off: Toggle Find Whole Word (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.alt+Y.description: On: Split Editor Window / Off: unassigned (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+I.description: On: Insert Tab / Off: IntelliSense (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+L.description: On: Select Word to Find / Off: Expand Line Selection (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+N.description: On: Insert New Line Above / Off: New File (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+W.description: On: Scroll Up / Off: Close Window (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+Z.description: On: Scroll Down / Off: Undo (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+_.description: On: Start/Cancel Recording Keyboard Macro / Off: unassigned (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.ctrl+^.description: On: Record/Replay Keyboard Macro / Off: unassigned (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.shift+F10.description: On: Tag Jump / Off: Show Editor Context Menu (VS Code default)

vzKeymap.breadcrumbsKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus and select on Breadcrumbs
(Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+A, Ctrl+F, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.listViewKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus and select on list views like Explorer pane
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+R, Ctrl+C, Ctrl+Q R, Ctrl+Q C, Ctrl+W, Ctrl+Z, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to select/accept items on Suggestion widget (IntelliSense)
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+R, Ctrl+C, Ctrl+Q R, Ctrl+Q C, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.settingsPageKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus between panes in the Settings page
(Ctrl+X, Ctrl+S, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.parameterHintKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to select Parameter hints
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X)

vzKeymap.codeActionKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to select Code Action menu
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.interactivePlaygroundKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to scroll in Interactive Playground pages
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+R, Ctrl+C)

vzKeymap.editorHoverKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to scroll in Editor Hovers
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+R, Ctrl+C, Ctrl+Q R, Ctrl+Q C)

vzKeymap.editorStickyScrollKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to select/accept items in editor's Sticky Scroll area
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.searchViewletKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus between panes in the Search viewlet
(Ctrl+W, Ctrl+Z, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.statusBarKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus on the Status Bar
(Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+A, Ctrl+F, Ctrl+Q S, Ctrl+Q D)

vzKeymap.notificationKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus on the Notifications
(Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+M)
Other keys such as Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X are enabled by List View Keys

vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus over widgets in widget containers
(Ctrl+W, Ctrl+Z)

vzKeymap.quickOpenKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus on the QuickOpen pickers
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.renameInputKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus on the rename suggestion list
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+M)

vzKeymap.iconPickerKeys.description:
Enables vz-style keys to move focus on an Icon Picker
(Ctrl+E, Ctrl+X, Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D, Ctrl+M)

keybindings.when: suggestWidgetMultipleSuggestions && suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys || suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus && !suggestWidgetHasFocusedSuggestion && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys

suggestWidgetMultipleSuggestions && suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys || suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus && !suggestWidgetHasFocusedSuggestion && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys

suggestWidgetMultipleSuggestions && suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys || suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus && !suggestWidgetHasFocusedSuggestion && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys
acceptSuggestionOnEnter && suggestWidgetHasFocusedSuggestion && suggestWidgetVisible && suggestionMakesTextEdit && textInputFocus && config.vzKeymap.suggestionWidgetKeys

listFocus && treeElementCanCollapse && !inputFocus && !treestickyScrollFocused && config.vzKeymap.listViewKeys || listFocus && treeElementHasParent && !inputFocus && !treestickyScrollFocused && config.vzKeymap.listViewKeys

listFocus && treeElementCanExpand && !inputFocus && !treestickyScrollFocused && config.vzKeymap.listViewKeys || listFocus && treeElementHasChild && !inputFocus && !treestickyScrollFocused && config.vzKeymap.listViewKeys

inputFocus && navigableContainerFocused && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+W || navigableContainerFocused && treestickyScrollFocused && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+W || navigableContainerFocused && !listFocus && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+W || navigableContainerFocused && listScrollAtBoundary == 'both' && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+W || navigableContainerFocused && listScrollAtBoundary == 'top' && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+W

inputFocus && navigableContainerFocused && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+Z || navigableContainerFocused && treestickyScrollFocused && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+Z || navigableContainerFocused && !listFocus && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+Z || navigableContainerFocused && listScrollAtBoundary == 'both' && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+Z || navigableContainerFocused && listScrollAtBoundary == 'bottom' && config.vzKeymap.widgetNavigationKeys && config.vzKeymap.ctrl+Z
